field.name: id
field.label: Slider ID
field.description: Slider ID

field.name: class
field.label: Slider Class
field.description: Slider Class

field.name: mode
field.label: Mode
field.description: Type of transition between slides

field.name: speed
field.label: Speed
field.description: Slide transition duration (in ms)

field.name: slideMargin
field.label: Slide Margin
field.description: Margin between each slide

field.name: startSlide
field.label: Start Slide
field.description: Starting slide index (zero-based)

field.name: randomStart
field.label: Random Start
field.description: Start slider on a random slide

field.name: slideSelector
field.label: Slide Selector
field.description: Element to use as slides (ex. 'div.slide').

field.name: infiniteLoop
field.label: Infinite Loop
field.description: If true, clicking 'Next' while on the last slide will transition to the first slide and vice-versa

field.name: hideControlOnEnd
field.label: HideControlOnEnd
field.description: If true, 'Next' control will be hidden on last slide and vice-versa Note: Only used when infiniteLoop: false

field.name: easing
field.label: Easing
field.description: The type of 'easing' to use during transitions.

field.name: captions
field.label: Captions
field.description: Include image captions. Captions are derived from the image's title attribute

field.name: ticker
field.label: Ticker
field.description: Use slider in ticker mode (similar to a news ticker)

field.name: tickerHover
field.label: Ticker Hover
field.description: Ticker will pause when mouse hovers over slider. Note: this functionality does NOT work if using CSS transitions!

field.name: adaptiveHeight
field.label: adaptiveHeight
field.description: Dynamically adjust slider height based on each slide's height

field.name: adaptiveHeightSpeed
field.label: adaptiveHeightSpeed
field.description: Slide height transition duration (in ms). Note: only used if adaptiveHeight: true

field.name: video
field.label: Video
field.description: If any slides contain video, set this to true. Also, include plugins/jquery.fitvids.js

field.name: responsive
field.label: Responsive
field.description: Enable or disable auto resize of the slider. Useful if you need to use fixed width sliders.

field.name: useCSS
field.label: Use CSS
field.description: If true, CSS transitions will be used for horizontal and vertical slide animations (this uses native hardware acceleration). If false, jQuery animate() will be used.

field.name: preloadImages
field.label: preloadImages
field.description: If 'all', preloads all images before starting the slider. If 'visible', preloads only images in the initially visible slides before starting the slider (tip: use 'visible' if all slides are identical dimensions)

field.name: touchEnabled
field.label: touchEnabled
field.description: If true, slider will allow touch swipe transitions

field.name: swipeThreshold
field.label: swipeThreshold
field.description: Amount of pixels a touch swipe needs to exceed in order to execute a slide transition. Note: only used if touchEnabled: true

field.name: oneToOneTouch
field.label: oneToOneTouch
field.description: If true, non-fade slides follow the finger as it swipes

field.name: preventDefaultSwipeX
field.label: preventDefaultSwipeX
field.description: If true, touch screen will not move along the x-axis as the finger swipes

field.name: preventDefaultSwipeY
field.label: preventDefaultSwipeY
field.description: If true, touch screen will not move along the y-axis as the finger swipes

field.name: pager
field.label: Pager
field.description: If true, a pager will be added

field.name: pagerType
field.label: Pager Type
field.description: If 'full', a pager link will be generated for each slide. If 'short', a x / y pager will be used (ex. 1 / 5)

field.name: pagerShortSeparator
field.label: pagerShortSeparator
field.description: If pagerType: 'short', pager will use this value as the separating character

field.name: pagerSelector
field.label: pagerSelector
field.description: Element used to populate the populate the pager. By default, the pager is appended to the bx-viewport

field.name: pagerCustom
field.label: pagerCustom
field.description: Parent element to be used as the pager. Parent element must contain a <a data-slide-index='x'> element for each slide.

field.name: buildPager
field.label: buildPager
field.description: If supplied, function is called on every slide element, and the returned value is used as the pager item markup.

field.name: controls
field.label: controls
field.description: If true, 'Next' / 'Prev' controls will be added

field.name: nextText
field.label: nextText
field.description: Text to be used for the 'Next' control

field.name: prevText
field.label: prevText
field.description: Text to be used for the 'Prev' control

field.name: nextSelector
field.label: nextSelector
field.description: Element used to populate the 'Next' control

field.name: prevSelector
field.label: prevSelector
field.description: Element used to populate the 'Prev' control

field.name: autoControls
field.label: autoControls
field.description: If true, 'Start' / 'Stop' controls will be added

field.name: startText
field.label: startText
field.description: Text to be used for the 'Start' control

field.name: stopText
field.label: stopText
field.description: Text to be used for the 'Stop' control

field.name: autoControlsCombine
field.label: autoControlsCombine
field.description: When slideshow is playing only 'Stop' control is displayed and vice-versa

field.name: autoControlsSelector
field.label: autoControlsSelector
field.description: Element used to populate the auto controls

field.name: auto
field.label: Auto
field.description: Slides will automatically transition

field.name: pause
field.label: pause
field.description: The amount of time (in ms) between each auto transition

field.name: autoStart
field.label: autoStart
field.description: Auto show starts playing on load. If false, slideshow will start when the 'Start' control is clicked

field.name: autoDirection
field.label: autoDirection
field.description: The direction of auto show slide transitions

field.name: autoHover
field.label: autoHover
field.description: Auto show will pause when mouse hovers over slider

field.name: autoDelay
field.label: AutoDelay
field.description: Time (in ms) auto show should wait before starting

field.name: minSlides
field.label: minSlides
field.description: The minimum number of slides to be shown. Slides will be sized down if carousel becomes smaller than the original size.

field.name: maxSlides
field.label: maxSlides
field.description: The maximum number of slides to be shown. Slides will be sized up if carousel becomes larger than the original size.

field.name: moveSlides
field.label: moveSlides
field.description: The number of slides to move on transition. This value must be >= minSlides, and <= maxSlides. If zero (default), the number of fully-visible slides will be used.

field.name: slideWidth
field.label: slideWidth
field.description: The width of each slide. This setting is required for all horizontal carousels!

field.name: layout
field.label: Shortcode Layout
field.description: Shortcode Layout
